thread.section_title: TinyDeal 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 TinyDeal 的点评意见 | www.tinydeal.com
thread.title: Azra Arslanagic-Fetahovic
thread.title_full: TinyDeal 的点评人 Azra Arslanagic-Fetahovic

author: Azra Arslanagic-Fetahovic
title: Azra Arslanagic-Fetahovic
text: From first day my personal experience with TinyDeal.com is more than satisfactory . Customer service is excellent, each time I send any type of inquiry, even the obvious ones (not seen by my side on FAQ section), they gave me support not only standard frase I usually got from some other sites - read FAQ, they answer in plain. Once my order did not arrived, no question asked - they ship it again. I'm really satisfied with everything on this site - lot of products, good prices, good quality, excellent support system. Overall my rating for them is highest possible.
